title: How Clinton's email controversy is impacting 2016 campaign
content:
According to a new poll, a majority of Americans disapprove of how Hillary Clinton handled the private email server…  
September 14, 2015, 7:31 AM|According to a new poll, a majority of Americans disapprove of how Hillary Clinton handled the private email server controversy. In July, 63 percent of them said they wanted Clinton to be the party's nominee. That number has since dropped to 42 percent. CBS News political…
